name: zotero-translation-client
browserslist: last 2 versions, not <0.5%, not IE<12, maintained node versions

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p build/ && NODE_ENV=production browserify -s ZoteroTranslationClient -d src/main.js -t [babelify] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | terser --compress --mangle > build/zotero-translation-client.js
scripts.browserify-debug: mkdir -p build/ && DEBUG=true NODE_ENV=production browserify -s ZoteroTranslationClient -d src/main.js -t [babelify] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -o build/zotero-translation-client.js
